mapper.insert: insert into t_place(place_id, place_name, place_type, create_by,create_time) values (#{placeId},#{placeName},#{placeType},#{createBy},#{createTime})
mapper.select: select tp.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName, tp.place_type as placeType, tp.create_by as createBy, date_format(tp.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, tp.update_by as updateBy, date_format(tp.update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') as updateTime, tp.is_eff as isEff from t_place as tp order by tp.update_time desc
select tp.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName, tp.is_eff as isEff from t_place as tp where tp.is_eff != 1

select place_id placeId, place_name placeName, place_type placeType, create_by createBy, create_time createTime, update_by updateBy, update_time updateTime from t_place tp where tp.place_id = #{placeId}
